Title: Establishes a clean and resilient energy program
Summary: Establishes a clean and resilient energy program to encourage the development of clean and resilient behind the meter distributed energy resource projects.
LawCode: Add §66-q, Pub Serv L; ren §1020-ll to be §1020-zz, §§1020-jj - 1020-ll to be §§1020-ww - 1020-yy, add §1020-jj, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law and the public authorities law, in relation to establishing a clean and resilient energy program
